name: Dreams Power
description:
For the first round of GDKO i made a character that has the power of making his Dreams come true. The traps that he is dreaming of are becomeing reality and the Nightmares too.

And the caracter has a sword that is helping him when he is falling asleep

I have a litle problem with enimy spawning on windows version I while try to fix it after the round ends.
